13  /* Reporter
14  TODO:
15  * Enumerations:
16  If the reporter class is adopted by PADO, then it would make sense to unify the enumeration types such
17  as ReportType and ReportLevel. One option is that these enumerations are replaced by PADO's enumerations.
18  Another option is that Reporter basic classes are used form IGlib (to avoid duplication) and PASO usese
19  enumerations from the Reporter class. This optiion would be the best from the point that it would eliminate
20  the need for two parallel development threads, but would imply that PADO should adopt IGlib as its part.
21  If PADO adopted IGLib then then further development of the Reporter's base classes in IGlib could be more
22  easily performed by taking into account specific needs of PADO.
23  If classes that were developed in parallel are merged at a later time, the replacement of the corresponding
24  enumerations can be easily done because mebers will be kept the same.
25 
26  QUESTIONS:
27  * For use with PADO:
28  Synchronization of tracing may be a problem. Synchronization with settings in the configuration file can be
29  achieved in such a way that PadoVariables.PadoTraceSwitch is assigned to the TracingSwitch property, in the
30  initialization block of the Reporter.Global get accessor, which will in turn synchronize the TracingLevel
31  property.
32  On the other hand, synchronization should also be achieved for setting the tracing level via the Pado
33  console. We should take care somehow that each time the PadoVariables.PadoTraceSwitch is changed, it is also
34  assigned to the Reporter.Global. Synchronization can not be put in the Reporter.Global accessor itself (except
35  in the initialization part) because
36 
37  WISH LIST (the necessity of individual items is to be discussed):
38  * Implement automatic timestamps in messages and a switch to enable or disable them (disabled by default)!
39  * What would we do if trace listeners would enable definition of levels for each individual trace listener?
40  -- see wish list in http://www.codeproject.com/KB/dotnet/customnettracelisteners.aspx
41  * Also enabe switching the timestamp for each individual message
42  *
43  */

1327  protected virtual void InitBegin()
1328  // $A Igor Oct08;
1329  {
1330  try
1331  {
1332  Obj = null;
1333  ReportDlg = null;
1334  ReportLocationDlg = null;
1335  ReportMessageDlg = null;
1336  ReserveReportErrorDlg = null;

1343  protected virtual void InitEnd()
1344  // $A Igor Oct08;
1345  {
1346  try
1347  {
1348  if (ReportDlg == null)
1349  SetDefaultReportDlg();
1350  if (ReportLocationDlg == null)

1352  if (ReportMessageDlg == null)

1357  catch { }

1366 
1379  public void Init(object obj,
1380  ReportDelegate reportdelegate,
1381  ReportLocationDelegate locationdelegate,
1382  ReportMessageDelegate messagedelegate,
1383  ReserveReportErrorDelegate reservereportdelegate)
1384  // $A Igor Oct08;
1385  {
1386  lock (lockobj)
1387  {
1388  InitBegin(); // Initial part of initialization that can be overridden by derived classes
1389  this.Obj = obj;
1390  this.ReportDlg = reportdelegate;
1391  this.ReportLocationDlg = locationdelegate;
1392  this.ReportMessageDlg = null; // messagedelegate;
1393  this.ReserveReportErrorDlg = reservereportdelegate;
1394  //Initialize delegates that were not provided with default values:
1395  InitEnd(); // final part of initialization that can be overridden
1396  }
1397  }

1473  ~ReporterBase()

1477 
1478  private bool isDisposed = false, dispLocked = false;
1479 
1480  public void Dispose()
1481  {
1482  Dispose(true);
1483  GC.SuppressFinalize(this);
1484  }
1485  protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)
1486  {
1487  if (!dispLocked)
1488  {
1489  dispLocked = true;
1490  if (!isDisposed)
1491  {
1492  if (disposing)
1493  {
1494  // Code to dispose the managed resources
1495  // held by the class
1496  }
1497  }
1498  // Code to dispose the unmanaged resources
1499  // held by the class
1500 
1501  try
1502  {
1503  try
1504  {
1505  TextWriterFlush();
1506  }
1507  catch { }
1508  try
1509  {
1510  RemoveTextWriters();
1511  }
1512  catch { }
1513  try
1514  {
1515  TextLoggerFlush();
1516  }
1517  catch { }
1518  try
1519  {
1520  RemoveTextLoggers();
1521  }
1522  catch { }
1523  }
1524  finally
1525  {
1526  }
1527 
1528 
1529  isDisposed = true;
1530  dispLocked = false;
1531  }
1532  }

1542 #region Erorr_Reporting_Global
1543 
1544  // Global error reporter of this class:
1545  // In derived classes, this block should be repeated, only with classs name of _Global and Global set to the
1546  // current (derived) class and with keyword new in property declarations.
1547 
1548  private static ReporterBase _Global = null;
1549  private static bool _GlobalInitialized = false;
1550  private static object GlobalLock = new object();
1551 
1553  public static bool GlobalInitialized
1554  {
1555  get { return _GlobalInitialized; }
1556  }
1557 
1560  public static bool ReadGlobalAppSettings = true;
1561 
1564  public static ReporterBase Global
1565  // $A Igor Oct08;
1566  {
1567  get
1568  {
1569  if (_Global == null)
1570  {
1571  lock (GlobalLock) // we need a lock only in initialization; otherwise global reporter is immutable
1572  {
1573  if (_Global== null && !_GlobalInitialized)
1574  {
1575  _Global = new ReporterBase();
1576  _Global.IsGlobal = true;
1577  if (ReadGlobalAppSettings)
1578  {
1579  _Global.ReadAppSettings();
1580  _Global.ReadAppSettings("Global");
1581  }
1582  _GlobalInitialized = true;
1583  }
1584  if (_Global == null)
1585  {
1586  // Default reserve error reporting method is used because we do not have a
1587  // reporter object reference here:
1588  DefaultReserveReportError(null, ReportType.Error, "Reporter.Global", "Global reporting system is not initialized.", null, null);
1589  }
1590  }
1591  }
1592  return _Global;
1593  }
1594  private set
1595  {
1596  lock (GlobalLock)
1597  {
1598  _Global = value;
1599  if (value != null)
1600  _GlobalInitialized = true;
1601  else
1602  _GlobalInitialized = false;
1603  }
1604  }
1605  }
1606 
1619  public static Exception ReviseException(Exception ex, string messageaddition, Type newtype,
1620  bool sametype, bool keepmessage, bool oldasinner)
1621  {
1622  Exception ret;
1623  Type extype = typeof(Exception); // Default type of the revised exception is simply Exception
1624  if (sametype)
1625  {
1626  // We will create exception of the same type as the original one:
1627  if (ex != null)
1628  extype = ex.GetType();
1629  else if (newtype!=null) // however, if exception is not specified, take the specified type if valid
1630  if (newtype.IsSubclassOf(typeof(Exception)))
1631  extype = newtype;
1632  } else
1633  {
1634  // Type of the revised exception is not the same as that of the old one; set the type to the specified one if valid:
1635  if (newtype != null)
1636  if (newtype.IsSubclassOf(typeof(Exception)))
1637  extype = newtype;
1638  }
1639  string message, oldmessage = (ex==null?"":ex.Message);
1640  if (messageaddition == null)
1641  messageaddition = "";
1642  if (keepmessage)
1643  message = messageaddition + oldmessage;
1644  else
1645  message = messageaddition;
1646  object[] args;
1647  if (oldasinner)
1648  {
1649  args = new object[2];
1650  args[0] = message;
1651  args[1] = ex;
1652  } else
1653  {
1654  args = new object[1];
1655  args[0] = message;
1656  }
1657  // ReturnedString = Activator.CreateInstance(extype,AppArguments) as Exception; // $$ Verjetno Nejeva koda, to je treba preveriti
1658  ret = (Exception)Activator.CreateInstance(extype,args); // Verjetno moja originalna koda - preveriti, kaj ostane not.
1659 
1660  return (ret);
1661  }
1662 
1663  // Specified old exception and message addition (or replacement):
1664 
1671  public static Exception ReviseException(Exception ex, string messageaddition)
1672  {
1673  return ReviseException(
1674  ex,
1675  messageaddition,
1676  null /* newtype */ ,
1677  true /* sametype */ ,
1678  true /* keepmessage */ ,
1679  false /* oldasinner */ );
1680  }

1699  false /* oldasinner */ );

1911 
1918  public static void GetAppSetting(string key, ref bool value, out bool assigned, bool otherformatsallowed)
1919  // $A Igor Feb09;
1920  {
1921  assigned = false;
1922  // Read the string value corresponding to the key (if defined):
1923  string str = GetAppSettingsValue(key);
1924  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(str))
1925  {
1926  str = str.ToLower();
1927  // The key is defined in the settings file, convert it to boolean:
1928  if (otherformatsallowed)
1929  {
1930  try
1931  {
1932  value = bool.Parse(str);
1933  assigned = true;
1934  }
1935  catch { }
1936  if (!assigned)
1937  {
1938  if (str == "y")
1939  value = true;
1940  else if (str == "n")
1941  value = false;
1942  else if (str == "yes")
1943  value = true;
1944  else if (str == "no")
1945  value = false;
1946  else if (str == "on")
1947  value = true;
1948  else if (str == "off")
1949  value = false;
1950  else
1951  {
1952  // Direct conversion failed,
1953  double numval = double.Parse(str); // this will throw exception if the format is wrong
1954  if (numval == 0.0)
1955  value = false;
1956  else
1957  value = true;
1958  }
1959  assigned = true;
1960  }
1961  } else
1962  {
1963  value = bool.Parse(str); // this will throw exception if the format is wrong
1964  assigned = true;
1965  }
1966  }
1967  }

1974  public static string GetAppSettingsValue(string key)
1975  {
1976 #if NETFRAMEWORK
1977  return ConfigurationManager.AppSettings.Get(key);
1978 #else
1979  throw new FrameworkDependencyException($"Coulld not read the value for key {key} from the ConfigurationManager.");
1980 #endif
1981 
1982  }

1984 
1989  public static void GetAppSetting(string key, ref ReportLevel value, out bool assigned)
1990  // $A Igor Feb09;
1991  {
1992  assigned = false;
1993  // Read the string value corresponding to the key (if defined):
1994  string str = GetAppSettingsValue(key);
1995  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(str))
1996  {
1997  // The key is defined in the settings file, convert it to the appropriate type:
1998  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(str))
1999  {
2000  string strlowercase = str.ToLower();
2001  if (strlowercase == "off")
2002  value = ReportLevel.Off;
2003  else if (strlowercase == "error")
2004  value = ReportLevel.Error;
2005  else if (strlowercase == "warning")
2006  value = ReportLevel.Warning;
2007  else if (strlowercase == "info")
2008  value = ReportLevel.Info;
2009  else if (strlowercase == "verbose")
2010  value = ReportLevel.Verbose;
2011  else
2012  throw new InvalidCastException("Can not convert the string \"" + str + "\" to the ReporterLevel enumeration.");
2013  assigned = true;
2014  }
2015  }
2016  }

2034  return KeyPrefix + "_" + keyroot;
2035  else
2036  return KeyPrefix + "_" + reportername + "_" + keyroot;
2037  }

2212  public bool AppSettingsRead(string groupname)
2213  {
2214  bool ret = false;
2215  if (groupname == null)
2216  groupname = "";
2217  lock (lockobj)
2218  {
2219  try
2220  {
2221  if (readconf != null)
2222  {
2223  ret = readconf.Contains(groupname);
2224  }
2225  }
2226  catch (Exception ex)
2227  {
2228  ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, null, "Can not check whether a group of settings named \"" + groupname +
2229  "\" has been read.", null, ex);
2230  }
2231  }
2232  return ret;
2233  }

2259  protected void AppSettingsReadWarning(string groupname)
2260  {
2261  if (AppSettingsRead(groupname) && AppSettingsWarnings)
2262  {
2263  string message;
2264  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(groupname))
2265  message = "Settings for the general group have already been read for the current reporter.";
2266  else
2267  message = "Settings belonging to the group named \"" + groupname +
2268  "\" have already been read for the current reporter.";
2269  ReserveReportError(ReportType.Warning, "Reporter configuration settings", message, null, null);
2270  }
2271  }
2272 
2275  protected void MarkAppSettingsRead(string groupname)
2276  {
2277  if (groupname == null)
2278  groupname = "";
2279  lock (lockobj)
2280  {
2281  try
2282  {
2283  if (!AppSettingsRead(groupname))
2284  {
2285  if (readconf == null)
2286  readconf = new List<string>();
2287  readconf.Add(groupname);
2288  }
2289  }
2290  catch (Exception ex)
2291  {
2292  ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, null, "Can not mark the group of settings named \"" + groupname +
2293  "\" as read.", null, ex);
2294  };
2295  }
2296  }

2304  KeyLevelOn = "LevelOn", // if set then it specifies the minimal level for reporting, logging and tracing altogether
2305  KeyLevelOff = "LevelOff", // if set then it specifies that the maximal level for reporting, logging and tracing altogether is below the specified level
2306  KeyReportingLevel = "ReportingLevel", // level of reporting
2307  KeyLoggingLevel = "LoggingLevel", // level of logging
2308  KeyTracingLevel = "TracingLevel", // level of tracing
2309

2311  KeyUseTextLogger = "UseTextLogger", // specifies whether or not the TextLogger is used in reporting
2312  KeyUseTrace = "UseTrace", // specifies whether or not Trace is used in reporting
2313 
2314  KeyTextWriterAppend = "TextWriterAppend", // specifies whether append mode is used for text writer files open via
2315  // configuration settings (this is not valid for files installed by function calls like AddTextWriter())
2316  KeyTextWriterFile = "TextWriterFile", // specifies the output file that is installed on the text writer when
2317  // configuration is read

2319  // configuration is read

2329  // configuration is read

2349  protected virtual void ReadAppSettingsBasic(string groupname)
2350  // $A Igor Feb09;
2351  {
2352  bool assigned, boolval = false;
2353  ReportLevel level = ReportLevel.Warning;
2354  int intval = 0;
2355  string stringval = null;
2356  char charval = ' ';
2357 
2358  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyLevelOn, ref level, out assigned);
2359  if (assigned) this[level] = true;
2360  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyLevelOff, ref level, out assigned);
2361  if (assigned) this[level] = false;
2362  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyReportingLevel, ref level, out assigned);
2363  if (assigned) ReportingLevel = level;
2364  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyLoggingLevel, ref level, out assigned);
2365  if (assigned) LoggingLevel = level;
2366  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTracingLevel, ref level, out assigned);
2367  if (assigned) TracingLevel = level;
2368 
2369  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyUseTextWriter, ref boolval, out assigned);
2370  if (assigned) UseTextWriter = boolval;
2371  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyUseTextLogger, ref boolval, out assigned);
2372  if (assigned) UseTextLogger = boolval;
2373  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyUseTrace, ref boolval, out assigned);
2374  if (assigned) UseTrace = boolval;
2375 
2376  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterAppend, ref boolval, out assigned);
2377  if (assigned) TextWriterAppend = boolval;
2378  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterFile, ref stringval, out assigned);
2379  if (assigned) SetTextWriter(stringval, TextWriterAppend);
2380  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterFile1, ref stringval, out assigned);
2381  if (assigned && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringval)) AddTextWriter(stringval, TextWriterAppend) ;
2382  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterWriteIntro, ref boolval, out assigned);
2383  if (assigned) TextWriterWriteIntro = boolval;
2384  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterProgramName, ref stringval, out assigned);
2385  if (assigned) TextWriterProgramName = stringval;
2386  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextWriterIntroText, ref stringval, out assigned);
2387  if (assigned) TextWriterIntroText = stringval;
2388 
2389  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerAppend, ref boolval, out assigned);
2390  if (assigned) TextLoggerAppend = boolval;
2391  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerFile, ref stringval, out assigned);
2392  if (assigned) SetTextLogger(stringval, TextLoggerAppend);
2393  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerFile1, ref stringval, out assigned);
2394  if (assigned && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringval)) AddTextLogger(stringval, TextLoggerAppend);
2395  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerWriteIntro, ref boolval, out assigned);
2396  if (assigned) TextLoggerWriteIntro = boolval;
2397  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerProgramName, ref stringval, out assigned);
2398  if (assigned) TextLoggerProgramName = stringval;
2399  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerIntroText, ref stringval, out assigned);
2400  if (assigned) TextLoggerIntroText = stringval;
2401 
2402  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerIndentInitial, ref intval, out assigned);
2403  if (assigned) TextLoggerIndentInitial = intval;
2404  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerIndentSpacing, ref intval, out assigned);
2405  if (assigned) TextLoggerIndentSpacing = intval;
2406  GetAppSetting(groupname, KeyTextLoggerIndentCharacter, ref charval, out assigned);
2407  if (assigned) TextLoggerIndentCharacter = charval;
2408

2411  if (assigned) AppSettingsWarnings = boolval;
2412  }

2418  public void ReadAppSettings(string groupname, bool onlyonce)
2419  // $A Igor Feb09;
2420  {
2421  lock (lockobj)
2422  {
2423  try
2424  {
2425  if (onlyonce && AppSettingsRead(groupname))
2426  AppSettingsReadWarning(groupname);
2427  else
2428  {
2429  ReadAppSettingsBasic(groupname);
2430  MarkAppSettingsRead(groupname);
2431  }
2432  }
2433  catch (Exception ex)
2434  {
2435  ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, "Reading configuration", null, null, ex);
2436  }
2437  }

2622  DefaultTracingLevel>=ReportLevel.Error,
2623  _TreatWarning = DefaultReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning || DefaultLoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning ||
2624  DefaultTracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning,
2625  _TreatInfo = DefaultReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info || DefaultLoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info ||
2626  DefaultTracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info,
2627  _TreatUndefined = DefaultReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose || DefaultLoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose || DefaultTracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose;

2630  {
2631  _TreatError = _ReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Error || _LoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Error ||
2632  _TracingLevel>=ReportLevel.Error;
2633  _TreatWarning = _ReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning || _LoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning ||
2634  _TracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Warning;
2635  _TreatInfo = _ReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info || _LoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info ||
2636  _TracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Info;
2637  _TreatUndefined = _ReportingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose || _LoggingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose ||
2638  _TracingLevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose;
2639  }

2707  public static bool DoLaunch(ReportType reptype, ReportLevel replevel)
2708  {
2709  switch (reptype)
2710  {
2711  case ReportType.Error:
2712  if (replevel >= ReportLevel.Error)
2713  return true;
2714  else
2715  return false;
2716  case ReportType.Warning:
2717  if (replevel >= ReportLevel.Warning)
2718  return true;
2719  else
2720  return false;
2721  case ReportType.Info:
2722  if (replevel >= ReportLevel.Info)
2723  return true;
2724  else
2725  return false;
2726  case ReportType.Undefined:
2727  if (replevel >= ReportLevel.Verbose)
2728  return true;
2729  else
2730  return false;
2731  default:
2732  return true;
2733  }
2734  }
2735

2768  public ReportLevel Level {
2769  get
2770  {
2771  ReportLevel ret = ReportingLevel;
2772  if (LoggingLevel > ret)
2773  ret = LoggingLevel;
2774  if (TracingLevel > ret)
2775  ret = TracingLevel;
2776  return ret;
2777  }
2778  set
2779  {
2780  ReportingLevel = LoggingLevel = TracingLevel = value;
2781  }
2782  }
2783 
2793  public virtual bool this[ReportLevel level]
2794  {
2795  get
2796  {
2797  return (ReportingLevel >= level || LoggingLevel >= level || TracingLevel >= level);
2798  }
2799  set
2800  {
2801  if (value)
2802  {
2803  if (ReportingLevel < level)
2804  ReportingLevel = level;
2805  if (LoggingLevel < level)
2806  LoggingLevel = level;
2807  if (TracingLevel < level)
2808  TracingLevel = level;
2809  }
2810  else // value = false
2811  {
2812  ReportLevel level1 = ReportLevel.Off;
2813  try
2814  {
2815  if (level > ReportLevel.Off)
2816  level1 = (ReportLevel) ((int) level - 1);
2817  }
2818  catch { }
2819  if (ReportingLevel > level1)
2820  ReportingLevel = (level1);
2821 
2822  if (LoggingLevel > level1)
2823  LoggingLevel = level1;
2824  if (TracingLevel > level1)
2825  TracingLevel = level1;
2826  }
2827  }
2828  }

3096  protected void ReserveReportError(ReportType messagetype, string location,
3097  string message, Exception ex, Exception ex1)
3098  // $A Igor Oct08;
3099  {
3100  try
3101  {
3102  lock (lockobj)
3103  {
3104  if (ReserveReportErrorDlg != null)
3105  {
3106  ReserveReportErrorDlg(this, messagetype, location, message, ex, ex1);
3107  }
3108  else
3109  ReserveReportErrorSpecific(messagetype, location, message, ex, ex1);
3110  }
3111  }
3112  catch (Exception)
3113  {
3114  ReserveReportErrorSpecific(messagetype, location, message, ex, ex1);
3115  }
3116  }

3118  // GENERAL REPORTING METHODS (for all kinds of reports):
3119 
3127  public virtual void Report(ReportType messagetype, string location, string message, Exception ex)
3128  // $A Igor Oct08;
3129  {
3130  string locationstr = "", messagestr = "";
3131  try
3132  {
3133  lock (lockobj)
3134  {
3135  try
3136  {
3137  if (DoReporting(messagetype))
3138  {
3139  if (ReportLocationDlg != null)
3140  locationstr = ReportLocationDlg(this, messagetype, location, ex);
3141  if (ReportMessageDlg != null)
3142  messagestr = ReportMessageDlg(this, messagetype, message, ex);
3143  if (ReportDlg != null)
3144  ReportDlg(this, messagetype, locationstr, messagestr);
3145  }
3146  }
3147  catch (Exception ex1)
3148  {
3149  this.ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, location,
3150  "Error in Reporter.Report. " + message, ex, ex1);
3151  }
3152  if (UseTextWriter && DoReporting(messagetype))
3153  {
3154  try
3155  {
3156  this.Report_TextWriter(messagetype, location, message, ex);
3157  }
3158  catch (Exception ex1)
3159  {
3160  this.ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, location,
3161  "Error in Reporter.Report_TextWriter. " + message, ex, ex1);
3162  }
3163  }
3164  if (UseTextLogger && DoLogging(messagetype))
3165  {
3166  try
3167  {
3168  this.Report_TextLogger(messagetype, location, message, ex);
3169  }
3170  catch (Exception ex1)
3171  {
3172  this.ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, location,
3173  "Error in Reporter.Report_TextLogger. " + message, ex, ex1);
3174  }
3175  }
3176  if (UseTrace && DoTracing(messagetype))
3177  {
3178  try
3179  {
3180  this.Report_Trace(messagetype, location, message, ex);
3181  }
3182  catch (Exception ex1)
3183  {
3184  this.ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, location,
3185  "Error in Reporter.Report_Trace. " + message, ex, ex1);
3186  }
3187  }
3188 
3189  if (ThrowTestException)
3190  {
3191  // Throw a test exception (please leave the capitalized part of the message unchanged!):
3192  throw new Exception("TEST INTERNAL EXCEPTION thrown by the reporter (after reporting has been performted).");
3193  }
3194  }
3195  }
3196  catch (Exception ex1)
3197  {
3198  ThrowTestException = false; // re-set, such that a test exception is thrown only once
3199  ReserveReportError(ReportType.Error, location, message, ex, ex1);
3200  }
3201  }

3431  }
3432  else if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(programname))
3433  {
3434  tw.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine
3435  + "Logging messages from " + programname
3436  + ", starting at " + DateTime.Now.ToString() + ":"
3437  + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine);

3439  else
3440  {

3442  + "Logging messages from reporter"

3447  }

4339  public bool RemoveTextWriters()
4340  {
4341  bool ret = true;
4342  lock (lockobj)
4343  {
4344  // Remove the default text writer:
4345  try
4346  {
4347  bool doremove = false, wasremoved=false;
4348  if (Writer != null && DisposeWriter)
4349  doremove = true;
4350  wasremoved = RemoveTextWriter();
4351  if (doremove && !wasremoved)
4352  ret = false;
4353  }
4354  catch { }
4355  if (Writers != null)
4356  {
4357  // Remove text writers from the list:
4358  int i = Writers.Count - 1;
4359  while (i >= 0)
4360  {
4361  bool failed = true;
4362  try
4363  {
4364  TWClass tw = Writers[i];
4365  if (tw != null)
4366  tw.ClearWriter();
4367  failed = false;
4368  Writers.RemoveAt(i);
4369  }
4370  catch { }
4371  if (failed)
4372  ret = false;
4373  --i;
4374  }
4375  }
4376  }
4377  return ret;
4378  }
4379 
4380 
4384  public bool RemoveTextWriter()
4385  {
4386  bool ret = true;
4387  lock (lockobj)
4388  {
4389  try
4390  {
4391  if (Writer == null)
4392  ret = false;
4393  else if (DisposeWriter)
4394  {
4395  ret = false;
4396  Writer.Close(); // Close() will call Dispose()
4397  Writer = null;
4398  ret = true;
4399  }
4400  }
4401  catch { }
4402  }
4403  return ret;
4404  }

4447 #region TextWriter_Custom_Operations

4449  // This provides support for performing custom operations on TextWriter's output streams.
4450  // These are operations taht are not in the scope of commonly supported by teh Repoirter, and
4451  // enable, for example, to write custom text at specific points.
4452 
4457  public List<TextWriter> TextWriterWriters()
4458  // $A Igor Feb09;
4459  {
4460  return TextWriterWriters(true);
4461  }
4462 
4470  public List<TextWriter> TextWriterWriters(bool writableonly)
4471  // $A Igor Feb09;
4472  {
4473  lock (lockobj)
4474  {
4475  List<TextWriter> ret = new List<TextWriter>();
4476  try
4477  {
4478  TextWriter tw = Writer;
4479  if (tw != null)
4480  {
4481  if (!writableonly)
4482  ret.Add(tw);
4483  else
4484  {
4485  try
4486  {
4487  tw.Write("");
4488  ret.Add(tw); // add writer to the list only if test operation does not throw an exception.
4489  }
4490  catch { }
4491  }
4492  }
4493  for (int i = 0; i < Writers.Count; ++i)
4494  {
4495  try
4496  {
4497  tw = Writers[i].Writer;
4498  if (!writableonly)
4499  ret.Add(tw);
4500  else
4501  {
4502  tw.Write("");
4503  ret.Add(tw); // add writer to the list only if test operation does not throw an exception.
4504  }
4505  }
4506  catch { }
4507  }
4508  }
4509  catch { }
4510  return ret;
4511  }
4512  }

4605  public int TextWriterWrite(string str)
4606  // $A Igor Feb09;

4609  {

4616  {

4619  if (doflushing)

4621  --numerrors;
4622  ++numwritten;
4623  }
4624  }
4625  catch { }
4626  try
4627  {
4628  if (Writers != null)

4634  if (writer != null)
4635  {
4636  ++numerrors;

4638  if (doflushing)
4639  writer.Flush();
4640  --numerrors;
4641  ++numwritten;
4642  }
4643  }
4644  catch { }
4645  }
4646  }
4647  catch { }
4648  if (numerrors > 0)
4649  throw new Exception("TextWriter: Writing to " + numerrors.ToString() + " output streams failed.");

4727  // Methods for reporting via text writer:
4728 
4737  protected virtual void Report_TextWriter(ReportType messagetype, string location, string message, Exception ex)
4738  // $A Igor Dec08;
4739  {
4740  lock (lockobj)
4741  {
4742  string locationstring = "", messagestring = "";
4743  if (ReportLocationDlgTextWriter != null)
4744  locationstring = ReportLocationDlgTextWriter(this, messagetype, location, ex);
4745  else if (ReportLocationDlg != null)
4746  locationstring = ReportLocationDlg(this, messagetype, location, ex);
4747  else
4748  {
4749  // No delegate for assembling location string:
4750  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
4751  locationstring += location;
4752  }
4753  if (ReportMessageDlgTextWriter != null)
4754  messagestring = ReportMessageDlgTextWriter(this, messagetype, message, ex);
4755  else if (ReportMessageDlg != null)
4756  messagestring = ReportMessageDlg(this, messagetype, message, ex);
4757  else
4758  {
4759  // No delegate for assembling message string:
4760  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(messagestring))
4761  {
4762  messagestring += message;
4763  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
4764  messagestring += " Details: ";
4765  }
4766  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
4767  messagestring += ex.Message;
4768  }
4769  if (ReportDlgTextWriter != null)
4770  ReportDlgTextWriter(this, messagetype, locationstring, messagestring);
4771  else
4772  throw new Exception("Stream reporting (logging) delegate is not specified.");
4773  }
4774  }

5164  public bool RemoveTextLoggers()
5165  {
5166  bool ret = true;
5167  lock (lockobj)
5168  {
5169  // Remove the default text writer:
5170  try
5171  {
5172  bool doremove = false, wasremoved = false;
5173  if (Logger != null && DisposeLogger)
5174  doremove = true;
5175  wasremoved = RemoveTextLogger();
5176  if (doremove && !wasremoved)
5177  ret = false;
5178  }
5179  catch { }
5180  if (Loggers != null)
5181  {
5182  // Remove text writers from the list:
5183  int i = Loggers.Count - 1;
5184  while (i >= 0)
5185  {
5186  bool failed = true;
5187  try
5188  {
5189  TWClass tw = Loggers[i];
5190  if (tw != null)
5191  tw.ClearWriter();
5192  failed = false;
5193  Loggers.RemoveAt(i);
5194  }
5195  catch { }
5196  if (failed)
5197  ret = false;
5198  --i;
5199  }
5200  }
5201  }
5202  return ret;
5203  }
5204 
5205 
5209  public bool RemoveTextLogger()
5210  {
5211  bool ret = true;
5212  lock (lockobj)
5213  {
5214  try
5215  {
5216  if (Logger == null)
5217  ret = false;
5218  else if (DisposeLogger)
5219  {
5220  ret = false;
5221  Logger.Close(); // Close() will call Dispose()
5222  Logger = null;
5223  ret = true;
5224  }
5225  }
5226  catch { }
5227  }
5228  return ret;
5229  }

5501 
5502  // Default delegate methods for reporting via TextLogger:
5503 
5514  static public string FormatLogMsgDefault(int depth, int initialindent, int indentincrement, char indentchar,
5515  ReportType type, string location, string message, ReportSource source)
5516  {
5517  string msg = "";
5518  int nspaces = initialindent + depth * indentincrement;
5519  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5520  location = location.Replace(Environment.NewLine, _newLineReplacement);
5521  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
5522  message = message.Replace(Environment.NewLine, _newLineReplacement);
5523  for (int i = 1; i <= nspaces; ++i)
5524  msg += indentchar;
5525  switch (type)
5526  {
5527  case ReportType.Error:
5528  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5529  msg += "ERROR: ";
5530  else
5531  msg += "ERROR in " + location + ": ";
5532  break;
5533  case ReportType.Warning:
5534  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5535  msg += "Warning: ";
5536  else
5537  msg += "Warning in " + location + ": ";
5538  break;
5539  case ReportType.Info:
5540  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5541  msg += "Info: ";
5542  else
5543  msg += "Info from " + location + ": ";
5544  break;
5545  default:
5546  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5547  msg += "Message: ";
5548  else
5549  msg += "Message from " + location + ": ";
5550  break;
5551  }
5552  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
5553  msg += message;
5554  msg += " | Source: " + source.ToString();
5555  return msg;
5556  }
5557 
5558 
5564  protected static void DefaultReport_TextLogger(ReporterBase reporter, ReportType messagetype,
5565  string location, string message)
5566  // $A Igor Dec08;
5567  {
5568  if (reporter == null)
5569  throw new Exception("The reporter object containing auxiliary data is not specified.");
5570  // Assemble the string that is written to the streams:
5571  string msg = FormatLogMsgDefault(reporter.Depth, reporter.TextLoggerIndentInitial, reporter.TextLoggerIndentSpacing, reporter.TextLoggerIndentCharacter,
5572  messagetype,
5573  location, message, reporter.MsgSource);
5574  // Write the string to all registered streams and files:
5575  int numwritten = reporter.TextLoggerWriteLine(msg);
5576  }

5617  protected virtual void Report_TextLogger(ReportType messagetype, string location, string message, Exception ex)
5618  // $A Igor Dec08;
5619  {
5620  lock (lockobj)
5621  {
5622  string locationstring = "", messagestring = "";
5623  if (ReportLocationDlgTextLogger != null)
5624  locationstring = ReportLocationDlgTextLogger(this, messagetype, location, ex);
5625  else if (ReportLocationDlg != null)
5626  locationstring = ReportLocationDlg(this, messagetype, location, ex);
5627  else
5628  {
5629  // No delegate for assembling location string:
5630  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5631  locationstring += location;
5632  }
5633  if (ReportMessageDlgTextLogger != null)
5634  messagestring = ReportMessageDlgTextLogger(this, messagetype, message, ex);
5635  else if (ReportMessageDlg != null)
5636  messagestring = ReportMessageDlg(this, messagetype, message, ex);
5637  else
5638  {
5639  // No delegate for assembling message string:
5640  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(messagestring))
5641  {
5642  messagestring += message;
5643  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
5644  messagestring += " Details: ";
5645  }
5646  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
5647  messagestring += ex.Message;
5648  }
5649  if (ReportDlgTextLogger != null)
5650  ReportDlgTextLogger(this, messagetype, locationstring, messagestring);
5651  else
5652  throw new Exception("Stream reporting (logging) delegate is not specified.");
5653  }
5654  }

5694  // Default delegate methods for reporting via Pado trace mechanism:
5695 
5696  static private string _newLineReplacement = " ... ";
5697 
5708  static public string FormatTraceMsgDefault(int depth, int initialindent, int indentincrement, char indentchar,
5709  ReportType type, string location, string message, ReportSource source)
5710  {
5711  string msg = "";
5712  int nspaces = initialindent + depth * indentincrement;
5713  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5714  location = location.Replace(Environment.NewLine, _newLineReplacement);
5715  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
5716  message = message.Replace(Environment.NewLine, _newLineReplacement);
5717  for (int i = 1; i <= nspaces; ++i)
5718  msg += indentchar;
5719  switch (type)
5720  {
5721  case ReportType.Error:
5722  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5723  msg += "ERROR: ";
5724  else
5725  msg += "ERROR in " + location + ": ";
5726  break;
5727  case ReportType.Warning:
5728  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5729  msg += "Warning: ";
5730  else
5731  msg += "Warning in " + location + ": ";
5732  break;
5733  case ReportType.Info:
5734  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5735  msg += "Info: ";
5736  else
5737  msg += "Info from " + location + ": ";
5738  break;
5739  default:
5740  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
5741  msg += "Message: ";
5742  else
5743  msg += "Message from " + location + ": ";
5744  break;
5745  }
5746  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
5747  msg += message;
5748  msg += " | Source: " + source.ToString();
5749  return msg;
5750  }

5758  string location, string message)
5759  {
5760  //ReporterPado rep = reporter as ReporterPado;
5761  //if (rep == null)
5762  // throw new ArgumentException("The reporter argument is not specified or is invalid (possible up-casting failure).");
5763  Trace.WriteLine(
5764  FormatTraceMsgDefault(reporter.Depth, reporter.TextLoggerIndentInitial, reporter.TextLoggerIndentSpacing, reporter.TextLoggerIndentCharacter,
5765  messagetype,
5766  location, message, reporter.MsgSource));
5767  }

6039  // Default function for reserve error reporting (called if an exception is thrown in an error reporting function):
6040 
6051  public static string DefaultReserveReportMessage(ReporterBase reporter, ReportType messagetype,
6052  string location, string message, Exception ex, Exception ex1)
6053  {
6054  string msg = "";
6055  try
6056  {
6057 
6058  try
6059  {
6060  msg = Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine
6061  + "************************************************************************"
6062  + Environment.NewLine
6063  + "ERROR IN THE REPORTING PROCEDURE." + Environment.NewLine;
6064  }
6065  catch { }
6066  try
6067  {
6068  msg += "Error Description: " + Environment.NewLine + " " + ex1.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6069  }
6070  catch { }
6071  try
6072  {
6073  if (location != null || message != null || ex != null)
6074  {
6075  msg += "Original Report: " + Environment.NewLine;
6076  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
6077  msg += "Location: " + location + Environment.NewLine;
6078  if (message != null)
6079  msg += "Message: " + message + Environment.NewLine;
6080  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
6081  msg += "Exception's message: " + ex.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6082  msg += "Report type: " + messagetype.ToString();
6083  if (ex1 != null)
6084  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex1.Message))
6085  {
6086  msg += Environment.NewLine;
6087  msg += "Exception thrown within the reporting system: ";
6088  msg += Environment.NewLine + " ";
6089  msg += ex1.Message;
6090  }
6091  }
6092  }
6093  catch { }
6094  try
6095  {
6096  msg += Environment.NewLine + DateTime.Now.ToString("<< yyyy-MM-dd, HH:mm:ss.FF >>");
6097 
6098  msg += Environment.NewLine
6099  + "************************************************************************"
6100  + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine;
6101  }
6102  catch { }
6103  }
6104  catch (Exception)
6105  {
6106  // Assembly of error message itself generated an error, use the last resort assembly procedure:
6107  try
6108  {
6109  msg += Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine
6110  + "== CRITICAL ERROR OCCURRED IN THE REPORTING SYSTEM: == " + Environment.NewLine +
6111  "Assembly of message for reserve error report has failed. Using last resort procedure."
6112  + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine;
6113  }
6114  catch { }
6115  try
6116  {
6117  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
6118  msg += "User provided location of the original report: " + Environment.NewLine +
6119  " " + location + Environment.NewLine;
6120  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
6121  msg += "User provided description of the original report: " + Environment.NewLine +
6122  " " + message + Environment.NewLine;
6123  if (ex != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
6124  msg += "Original exception description: " + Environment.NewLine +
6125  " " + ex.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6126  if (ex1 != null) if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex1.Message))
6127  msg += Environment.NewLine + "Exception raised in the assembly method: " + Environment.NewLine +
6128  " " + ex1.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6129  msg += Environment.NewLine;
6130  }
6131  catch { }
6132  }
6133  return msg;
6134  }

6148  public static void DefaultReserveReportError(ReporterBase reporter, ReportType messagetype,
6149  string location, string message, Exception ex, Exception ex1)
6150  // $A Igor Oct08;
6151  {
6152  string msg = "";
6153  try
6154  {
6155  // Create decorated reserve error report's message:
6156  msg = DefaultReserveReportMessage(reporter, messagetype,
6157  location, message, ex, ex1);
6158  }
6159  catch { }
6160  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(msg))
6161  {
6162  try
6163  {
6164  msg += Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine;
6165  msg += "ERROR: " + Environment.NewLine;
6166  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(location))
6167  msg += "Location: " + location + Environment.NewLine;
6168  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))
6169  msg += "User provided message: " + message + Environment.NewLine;
6170  if (ex!=null)
6171  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex.Message))
6172  msg+="Original exception message: " + ex.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6173  if (ex1!=null)
6174  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ex1.Message))
6175  msg+="Internal exception message: " + ex1.Message + Environment.NewLine;
6176  msg+=Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine;
6177  }
6178  catch { }
6179  }
6180  try
6181  {
6182  // Output the message to a console:
6183  Console.Write(msg);
6184  }
6185  catch { }
6186  try
6187  {
6188  // Output the message to output streams and files registered with Reporter's TextWriter:
6189  int numerrors = reporter.TextWriterWrite(msg);
6190  }
6191  catch { }
6192  try
6193  {
6194  // Output the message to output streams and files registered with Reporter's TextLogger:
6195  int numerrors = reporter.TextLoggerWrite(msg);
6196  }
6197  catch { }
6198  }

6209  public static string ErrorLocationString0(Exception ex)
6210  // $A Igor Oct08;
6211  {
6212 
6213  string locationstr = "", functionname = "", filename = "";
6214  int line = -1, column = -1;
6215  StackTrace trace = null;
6216  try
6217  {
6218  try
6219  {
6220  // Extract info about error location:
6221  trace = new StackTrace(ex, true);
6222  functionname = trace.GetFrame(0).GetMethod().Name;
6223  filename = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileName();
6224  line = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileLineNumber();
6225  column = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileColumnNumber();
6226  }
6227  catch { }
6228  locationstr += functionname;
6229  if (line > 0 && column >= 0 || !string.IsNullOrEmpty(filename))
6230  {
6231  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(locationstr))
6232  locationstr += " ";
6233  locationstr += "<";
6234  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(filename))
6235  locationstr += Path.GetFileName(filename);
6236  if (line > 0 && column >= 0)
6237  {
6238  locationstr += "[" + line.ToString() + "," + column.ToString() + "]";
6239  }
6240  locationstr += ">";
6241  }
6242  }
6243  catch { }
6244  return locationstr;
6245  }

6264  ret = location;

6282  public static string GetErorString(Exception e)
6283  {
6284  string errstr = "", functionname = null, filename = null;
6285  int line = -1, column = -1;
6286  System.Diagnostics.StackTrace trace = null;

6292  filename = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileName();
6293  line = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileLineNumber();
6294  column = trace.GetFrame(0).GetFileColumnNumber();
6295  errstr += "Error in " + functionname +
6296  "\n < " + filename +
6297  " (" + line.ToString() +
6298  ", " + column.ToString() +
6299  ") >: \n\n";
6300  errstr += e.Message;
6301  }
6302  catch { }
